prediction.health: You'll be glad to feel fresh, fit and fine. No major trouble is visible on health front. You must include breathing exercise s in order to relieve stress. Intake of balanced diet is must. Avoid spicy and oily food.
prediction.emotions: Today you will find yourself overflowing with ideas. Career and professional achievement would be the fields into which your emotions are best channeled.
prediction.profession: Income will increase. Bosses will be pleased in the office. Business will grow. Do not deny taking a new responsibility today. Working conditions are in your favor. The day is good for traders. Funds can be invested in new projects.
prediction.luck: Luck is on your side. You will spend time with family and may also celebrate happy some happy occasion.
prediction.personal_life: Love relations will strengthen and marital life will be beautiful. You will get full support from the family members today.  Friends will also favor you. Your children will keep you happy.

prediction.health: You will feel active and happy the whole day. Beginning a new physical exercise regime and sporting activity will cause good health. Tendency to suffer from joints and muscular pain exists. However, there are no major health related issues to worry about.
prediction.emotions: This is a time of heightened yet manageable emotions. Increased sensitivity and warmth helps endear you to others.
prediction.profession: This is a good time for making business decisions, investments and dispute settlements. You shall have an edge over competitors. Job interview or negotiations will give good results. It's your time to be recognized and appreciated.
prediction.luck: There are a few pleasant surprises in store for you today. You will be able to achieve immense success even with small efforts.
prediction.personal_life: You will be more sympathetic to the feelings of others and shall freely share your own emotions with them. It’s a party time. Enjoy the day with family and friends. You may get an invitation to attend a social gathering.
prediction.travel: Traveling for professional purpose will prove very productive.

prediction.health: The day is not very good regards your health. Do not take any medication without proper prescription. Take care of your food habits to prevent the risk of food poisoning. Avoid fried and junk food as it can lead to gastric problems.
prediction.emotions: Emotions will surface today. Try to re-evaluate your feelings before you take any decision.
prediction.profession: You will have to bear more responsibilities in the office. You may lose your temper today and get into arguments with your colleagues. Be patient and focused and everything will work in your favor.
prediction.luck: Your luck is fluctuating. Avoid taking major decisions or initiating anything new today as things might not go as per your expectations.
prediction.personal_life: There's tension in the air, so be careful. You may have to face some complication in your personal relationships. Watch against some minor conflicts with your partner. Beware of a friend who may ditch you the last moment.
prediction.travel: Your luck is fluctuating. Avoid taking major decisions or initiating anything new today as things might not go as per your expectations.

prediction.health: Travel will help you in overcoming your boredom for a short period. You’ll remain enthusiastic during traveling.
prediction.emotions: You shall experience happiness and excitement all around. You will move ahead with renewed vigor and confidence and achieve even the seemingly impossible tasks.
prediction.profession: A opportunity opens up to offer you better prospects in your career. Family and friends shall help you financially to set up your won venture. Businessmen will get new opportunities to expand their work.
prediction.luck: You shall experience happiness and excitement all around. You will move ahead with renewed vigor and confidence and achieve even the seemingly impossible tasks.
prediction.personal_life: Your personal communications will have an emotional depth and will be fruitful. You shall be very popular in social circles. You may make plans of investing in a new home, property or a vehicle. You will discuss your future plans with loved ones.
prediction.travel: You may also get opportunity to go on business trips along with your friends. Outings with family are also possible.

prediction.health: You need to take precautions against all sorts of allergies and viral infections today, though it will not be easy to avoid. Get immediate medical attention if you notice even a minor health problem.
prediction.emotions: You will have a tendency to act in a rather irrational, demanding way towards others.  You need to control your emotions and avoid doing anything that could deteriorate the situation.
prediction.profession: There may be difficult situations at work. People may harm your reputation and misunderstandings may occur. Sudden changes in work are also likely will increase pressure on you. This is not a good time to decide on new investments.
prediction.luck: This is not an auspicious time to venture into anything new. Things would not work in your favor.
prediction.personal_life: Romantic overtures will not pay. You will experience disappointment in love. Your family shall expect a lot from you which could annoy you. Try to be more calm and composed in your approach.
prediction.travel: This is not at all a good time for travelling. There shall be hindrances and you shall not gain anything out of the trips made.

prediction.health: It is important for you to adopt some relaxation techniques so that you do not accumulate needless stress and endanger your health. Ensure that you get plenty of physical exercise today. Include breathing exercises in order to relieve nervous tension.
prediction.emotions: You shall be more emotional than usual today and end up risking your vulnerable self to others.
prediction.profession: Finances will continue to be good in spite of increase in expenditure. At work heavy responsibility and chaotic activities will keep you on toes. New opportunities will come your way. Grab this opportunity while there is still time.
prediction.luck: Luck will favor your moderately. You will be able to achieve great things by your small efforts.
prediction.personal_life: Differences of attitudes in married life will continue. Avoid strong arguments with spouse. There may be disagreements with friends and associates. It is better not to give loans or sign surety for anyone, howsoever close to you.
prediction.travel: You might go on an unexpected tour today. Enjoy the journey.

prediction.health: Apart from some minor health issues, you shall enjoy good general health today. You will overcome minor complications if any. This is a good time to embark on a new fitness regime. Keep away from bad habits and vices.
prediction.emotions: Today you shall feel extremely positive and in high spirits. You shall radiate positive energy.
prediction.profession: You will enjoy success in your profession. Profitable opportunities will surface in business. For those in a service, your bosses will reward you for the good work done; a good bonus may be on the way.
prediction.luck: Today is your lucky day. You shall get a sudden windfall gain or an old investment will bring huge profits.
prediction.personal_life: You may meet a new love interest. Pursue this person as this relationship can culminate in marriage. You may buy yourself a new conveyance or some other possession which has been on your wish list for quite some time now. You will win arguments.

prediction.emotions: You feel good and warm today towards just about everyone around you. Original ideas will fill your mind.

prediction.luck: You are fortunate as today is a very good time for carrying out new projects or starting a new business plan.

prediction.health: You may have pain in lower neck, shoulders and arms. Health of younger siblings could also cause tension. Ayurvedic treatment or massage can get you relief. Don’t indulge in any kind of addiction.

prediction.travel: Tours will be troublesome. Be cautious while traveling. Chances of getting injured are high so travel with utter care.

prediction.emotions: You shall feel frustrated and upset. Your confidence level will decrease.

prediction.luck: Today definitely is not a lucky day for you. You will have to struggle to make it auspicious for you.
